entry.name: STATUS_UNKNOWN
entry.description: We do not currently know the status

entry.name: STATUS_MULTICOPTER
entry.description: The hydradrone is configured as a multicopter

entry.name: STATUS_AQUATIC
entry.description: The hydradrone is configured as an aquatic drone

entry.name: STATUS_TRANSIENT
entry.description: The hydradrone is changing its configuration

enum.name: PAYLOAD_ACTION
enum.description: Actions that can be performed by payloads

entry.name: PAYLOAD_TAKE_MEASURE
entry.description: Ask the payload to make a measurment

message.name: HYDRADRONE_STATUS
message.description: Message describing the current physical configuration of the hydradrone. Use MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE to request it.

message.name: PAYLOAD_STATUS
message.description: Message describing the current status of the payload. Use MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE to request it.

message.name: SET_PAYLOAD_PARAMETER
message.description: Message used to set a payload parameter. A PAYLOAD_PARAMETER is emited in response to confirm the new parameter value

message.name: PAYLOAD_PARAMETER
message.description: Message used to broadcast a payload parameter. Use MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE to request it.

message.name: DO_PAYLOAD_ACTION
message.description: Message used to request a payload action.

message.name: PAYLOAD_ACTION_DONE
message.description: Message used to signal the execution of a payload action.
